name: Starboard: The Pirate Entrepreneur
description:
Everybody be liking money, arr? And there be no better way to make money than ye old piracy! Ye have been so shocked by this here information that ye just sold everything ye own to sail the seven seas, and hopefully bring in more than you spend.

YAAR!!!!

Ye olde Features:

  • Sail the seven seas, with realistic sailin’ physics!
  • Lay ye waste to th’ tyrrannic Brütish Empyre and th’ Evil White Pearl Syndicate!
  • Visit ye many different locations, such as a lighthouse, and a wretched desert island!

Ye Olde Controls:

[W][A][S][D]: Sail ye ship [Left Mouse]: Aim yer cannon [Left Click]: Fire ye cannon
